sqlMap.select: select a.WH_XH as whXh,a.SS_JGBM as ssJgbm,a.WS_DM as wsDm,a.LEFT_MARGIN as leftMargin,a.TOP_MARGIN as topMargin, a.CJR_CZY_DJXH as cjrCzyDjxh,a.CJRQ as cjrq,a.XGR_CZY_DJXH as xgrCzyDjxh,a.XGRQ as xgrq from QY_WSDYSZ a where a.WH_XH=#whXh#
sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_ZY_DJXH.nextval as whXh from dual
insert into QY_WSDYSZ(WH_XH,SS_JGBM,WS_DM,LEFT_MARGIN,TOP_MARGIN, CJR_CZY_DJXH,CJRQ,XGR_CZY_DJXH,XGRQ) values(#whXh:NUMERIC#,#ssJgbm:NUMERIC#,#wsDm:VARCHAR#,#leftMargin:NUMERIC#,#topMargin:NUMERIC#, #cjrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#,to_date(#cjrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'),#xgrCzyDjxh:NUMERIC#,to_date(#xgrq:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
